itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by CampingWorld CEO and "The Profit" host Marcus Lemonis to talk about his new podcast “One Hundred Percent”, his investing and business strategies, why he got into the RV business, and why he is mystified by people being upset with Jeff Bezos for going to space.
